title: One Direction - Best Song Ever[1080p x264]-{BFAB}-[P2PDL]
description:
<a href="http://cdn.piczend.com/images/KGL1AqQj/1374669883_cover.jpg" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://cdn.piczend.com/images/KGL1AqQj/1374669883_cover.jpg</a>

"Best Song Ever" is a song recorded by the British-Irish boy band One Direction. It was released on 22 July 2013 by Syco and Columbia. The song was recorded in 2013 and consists of a running length of 3 minutes and 21 seconds. The opening of the song samples The Who's "Baba O'Riley" which was released in 1971.It was announced by One Direction in a video uploaded to their YouTube channel on 25 June 2013.The trailer for This is Us was released thirty minutes after the video was uploaded, and included a short preview of the song.[3] The song became available for pre-order on iTunes on 26 June. After being leaked, the song's audio was uploaded to VEVO on 19 July.The music video was officially released on 22 July.The music video also broke the VEVO record for having the most views in a 24-hour period with 12.3 million, beating Miley Cyrus' "We Can't Stop" which recorded 10.7 million.The video premiered on One Direction's Vevo channel. It runs for 6:13 and features the band playing themselves and other characters (Horan and Tomlinson playing executives, Styles playing a marketing person, Payne playing a choreographer and Malik cross-dressing and playing a female assistant.).
